event.title: known as Nossa Senhora do Rosário in 1674

data.event: It became known as Nossa Senhora do Rosário in 1674.
It became a parish on December 27, 1693.
It also became Vila de Nossa Senhora do Rosário do Porto da Cachoeira do Paraguaçu in 1698.
In early 1800, the Cachoeirense society became very important politically.

event.title: became a city under the imperial decree of March 13, 1873

data.event: The town became a city under the imperial decree of March 13, 1873 (Provincial Law 43).
